title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 331.7 - Liberal construction of signature and ballot application information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 331.7 - Liberal construction of signature and ballot application information

State Regulations

Liberal construction shall be given to the signature of the
military voter who addresses a letter to his family or to the division or
otherwise, requesting a military ballot or expressing a desire to
vote. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
331.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
